name: Bunker: Zombie Survival Games
description:
You are a geneticist who woke up in a forest house. Everyone you knew has turned into bloodthirsty zombies, the world is dying out and a secret experiment is to blame. The only way to prevent disaster is to go to an underground laboratory to create a cure and save those who are still alive

Arm yourself to the teeth, because the most vicious monsters will stand in your way. Solve puzzles, look for items, manage resources, do everything possible to save the world from a terrible epidemic, because only you can do it

An exciting adventure, an interesting plot and dangerous traps await you. Are you ready to face your fears? Then nothing will stop you

Game Features:
- exciting story
- extensive arsenal
- story puzzles
- terrible monsters
- exciting adventure
we tried to bring the best to the game

In this game, we have mixed the most beloved game genres: story adventure, action shooter and survival horror. This is a real gift to all gamers who really love video games
